item.description:
I will be at a West Haven Bar & Grill for a little while to unwind.
It has been a rough work week.

I have early morning training at work on Thursday, so I will only be
At the Bar & Grill till around 10:00.

So, if anyone wants to drop by for an hour then come on by.

I would only expect those who live in Greater New Haven area to
Drop by.

In the future, there will be more work week West Haven or Milford
Area get togethers. I would not expect any of those who live far away
To come by.
Parking in downtown New Haven is a pitb, so do not expect me to
Go there too often.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: I will be listening to the Karaoken Crooners.
item.why: Who wants to unwind on Hump Day.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: MidWeek Unwind at Local GNH B & G
